welcomeBack: Welcome back! Please enter your credentials to access your account. If you encounter any issues, feel free to reach out to our support team for assistance. Your privacy and security are our top priorities.
invalidPasswordFormat: Password must be at least 8 characters long, include an uppercase letter, a lowercase letter, a number, and a special character
fetchErrorTitle: Oops! Something went wrong while fetching the movies.
fetchErrorDescription: It seems there was a problem fetching the data. This might be due to a temporary issue with our servers or a network problem. Please try refreshing the page. If the problem persists, you may want to check your internet connection or contact our support team for further assistance.
emptyMoviesTitle: Your movie list is currently empty
emptyMoviesDescription: It looks like you haven't added any movies to your list yet. This is a great opportunity to start building your personal collection. Click the button below to add your first movie and begin curating your movie library. It's simple and quick to get started, and soon you'll have a list of your favorite films right here.
saveError: An error occurred while saving the movie. Please try again.
deleteMessage: Deleting {{movieTitle}} will remove all associated data and actions. This action cannot be undone. Please ensure you want to proceed.
